meanings.definition: A wheel with a grooved rim around which a cord passes.
meanings.sent1: The pulleys helped lift the heavy box.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic used pulleys to hoist the car engine.
meanings.sent3: The playful kitten got tangled in the pulleys while exploring the garage.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like pulleys, guiding me towards her every move.
meanings.sent5: The pulleys spun smoothly, making the task effortless.

meanings.definition: A simple machine consisting of a wheel with a grooved rim in which a rope can run to change the direction or point of application of a force applied to the rope.
meanings.sent1: We used pulleys to raise the flag to the very top of the pole.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers relied on pulleys to lift heavy beams to the higher floors.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the pulleys to swing from tree to tree.
meanings.sent4: Her smile acted like pulleys, redirecting my attention towards her.
meanings.sent5: The pulleys multiplied our strength, making the task seem effortless.
